name: Central Tree
uniques: Does not need removal of [Forest]
Ensures a minimum tile yield of [+2 Food, +1 Production]
Unpillagable
Irremovable
Unbuildable
Excluded from map editor

civilopediaText.text: Marks the center of a city
Appearance changes with the technological era of the owning civilization

name: Forest Farm
uniques: Does not need removal of [Forest]
Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
[+1 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Civil Service]>
[+1 Food] from [non-fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Fertilizer]>
[+1 Food] <after discovering [Chemistry]>
Cannot be built on [Water] tiles <hidden from users>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]

name: Tree fort
uniques: Great Improvement
Gives a defensive bonus of [100]%
Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [30] damage
Can be built just outside your borders
Gain control over [all] tiles in a [1]-tile radius
Does not need removal of [Forest]
Will not be replaced by automated units
